page.title: 02HOME LIFE. A MOTHER'S DAY.
page.content: Mrs. Margery Delahay,The Downs,Ivy House Lane,Gorsley Wakes up at 7.45am approx and has breakfast which is a cup of tea and toast,and sometimes takes Master Jeremy Delahay up to Gorsley Goffs School.After making the beds she polishes the furniture and then settles down for a cup of coffee. Newent is out of our block of area,but it is where my mum helps old folk(Grannybashing is the nickname)She gets back about 12.30pm and might polish our Red Morris 8 vintage car. Then she would get her lunch,and then Prepare the evening meal. When relaxing she might switch on the television and have another! cup of coffee. Some nights she might go out to W.I.,Guides,or meetings.
